jobDescription: Title: Manager, Owned Media Idea Evolver is seeking a full-time manager of Owned Media in Brooklyn, NY.  The primary responsibility is to create client deliverables including search behavior research, digital asset optimizations and performance insight reports.  Idea Evolver specializes in content marketing, search experience optimization and technology.  Notable clients include AstraZeneca, Campbell's Soup, Dannon and K. Hovnanian Homes. Qualifications - 2 years of relevant work experience  - Expertise in online marketing  - Excellent communication skills (verbal and written)  - Proficiency in Microsoft Office  - Understanding of digital design and development (how websites work) Compensation and Benefits - Competitive salary  - Excellent health and dental  - 401k  - 15 paid days off plus holidays  - Workstation includes the newest equipment, Herman Miller chair, and a hand-crafted sit/stand desk
